'''Mason Post''' is a doctor who was running a vaccine trial.


Mason was administering trial vaccines and placebos for a company that had developed a COVID- vaccine. When Levi got into the trial, Mason administered his shot. While getting his shot, they chatted. Over the next several weeks, at subsequent visits, they started talking more. At the end of the trial, Mason gave Levi his address and invited him to come over at the end of his day if he wanted to. Levi ultimately did not go over.



While working with Levi Schmitt, he flirted. After several weeks of this, he gave Levi his address and asked him to come over if he wanted.


He works for a medical company called Quimby, overseeing their west coast vaccine trials.
